constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 40 (Monday, March 7, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KIM of New Jersey:
H.R. 6959.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H1330]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: American Volunteering Corporation Act
